# Dash Documentation â€” Dash latest documentation

> The Dash Documentation offers information and guides on Dash, the open source peer-to-peer cryptocurrency with a strong focus on the payments industry.

## Docs

- [Dash User Docs](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/index.html)
- [Dash Core Docs](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/index.html)
- [Dash Platform Docs](https://docs.dash.org/projects/platform/en/stable/docs/index.html)

## User Docs

### First Step
- [What is Dash?](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/introduction/about.html)
- [Features](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/introduction/features.html)

### Users
- [Wallets](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/wallets/index.html)
- [Earning and Spending](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/earning-spending.html)

### Network
- [Governance](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/governance/index.html)
- [Masternodes](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/masternodes/index.html)
- [Mining](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/mining/index.html)
- [Developers](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/developers/index.html)
  - [Integration Overview](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/developers/integration.html)
  - [API Services](https://www.dash.org/providers-and-tools/#custody-and-api)
  - [SDK Resources](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/developers/integration-sdks.html)
- [Dashmate](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/network/dashmate/index.html)
- [Dash Evo Tool](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/user/network/dash-evo-tool/index.html)

## Core Docs
- [Glossary](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/resources/glossary.html)
- [Dash Improvement Proposals](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/dips/README.html)

### Reference
- [P2P Network](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/reference/p2p-network.html)
- [Introduction](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/reference/introduction.html)
- [Blockchain](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/reference/block-chain.html)
- [Transactions](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/reference/transactions.html)

### API
- [Remote Procedure Calls (RPCs)](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/api/remote-procedure-calls.html)
  - [RPC Quick Reference List](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/api/remote-procedure-call-quick-reference.html)
- [HTTP REST](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/api/http-rest.html)
- [ZeroMQ (ZMQ) Notifications](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/api/zmq.html)

### Guides
- [Dash Features](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/guide/dash-features.html)

### Dash Core Wallet
- [Arguments and Commands](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/dashcore/wallet-arguments-and-commands.html)
- [Configuration Files](https://docs.dash.org/en/stable/docs/core/dashcore/wallet-configuration-file.html)
